documenttitle.text: Red Hat Security Advisory: Transition Red Hat Network Classic Hosted to Red Hat Subscription Management

note.text:
This is the 3-year notification of the target date to migrate systems from
Red Hat Network Classic Hosted to Red Hat Subscription Management. All
systems using Red Hat Network Classic Hosted must be migrated to Red Hat
Subscription Management.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
Red Hat is transitioning to Red Hat Subscription Management for all Red
Hat products by July 31, 2017. All systems registered as clients to Red
Hat Network Classic Hosted directly, or indirectly with Red Hat Proxy,
must be migrated to Red Hat Subscription Management by July 31, 2017.
Customers using Red Hat Satellite to manage their systems are not affected
by this transition.
note.title: Details
